[00:00.00]Sleigh Ride - The Ronettes
[00:08.43]Lyrics by：M. Parish/L. Anderson
[00:16.86]Composed by：L. Anderson/M. Parish
[00:25.29]Just hear those sleigh bells jingling ring tingle tingling too
[00:29.23]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding
[00:31.02]Come on it's lovely weather for a sleigh ride together with you
[00:34.60]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding
[00:35.71]Outside the snow is falling and friends are calling "Yoo hoo"
[00:39.95]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding
[00:41.19]Come on it's lovely weather for a sleigh ride together with you
[00:44.98]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding
[00:46.98]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding
[00:49.44]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding
[00:52.10]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding
[00:58.85]Our cheeks are nice and rosy and comfy and cozy are we
[01:02.74]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding
[01:03.97]Were snuggled up together like two birds of a feather would be
[01:07.74]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding
[01:09.05]Let's take the road before us and sing a chorus or two
[01:12.81]Ring-a-ling-a ding-dong-ding

data.trans:
[ti:Sleigh Ride]
[ar:The Ronettes]
[al:The Ronettes: Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:08.43]//
[00:16.86]//
[00:25.29]刚刚听见了雪橇铃叮铃铃响声
[00:29.23]叮叮铃铃响声
[00:31.02]来吧 在这怡人天气与你一起骑雪橇
[00:34.60]叮叮铃铃响声
[00:35.71]外面雪花飘落 朋友们高声呼喊
[00:39.95]叮叮铃铃响声
[00:41.19]来吧 在这怡人天气与你一起骑雪橇
[00:44.98]叮叮铃铃响声
[00:46.98]叮叮铃铃响声
[00:49.44]叮叮铃铃响声
[00:52.10]叮叮铃铃响声
[00:58.85]我们的脸颊美丽又红润
[01:02.74]叮叮铃铃响声

[01:07.74]叮叮铃铃响声
